name: Mattress Chipre
title: The best ally for the growth of your children
description: The Cyprus mattress stands out for its incredible value for money. Une quality in its materials and exclusive Maxcolchon Eco-Fresche treatment. 2.5 cm of Airsystem Supersoft in its padding and 4 cm of Viscoelastic Sensus breathable 65 kg in its core.

name: Mattress Elasticmax
title: Relax your body while you rest
description: Memory foam mattress 6 cm. The Elasticmax mattress has intermediate firmness, being excellent for pressure reduction. 2 cm of 80 kg density padded natural memory foam and 4 cm of 65 kg memory foam at its core.

name: Mattress Naturfresh
title: Máxima evacuación del calor, el descanso más fresco
description: Naturfresh mattress is recommended for hot people due to its maximum capacity for heat evacuation. 6 cm of perforated and breathable Sensus memory foam. 2 cm of DRY-FEEL upper that quickly evacuates heat and moisture. Firm mattress.

name: Mattress Oximax
title: You will sleep on a cloud
description: Memory foam mattress 4 cm with a soft intermediate firmness, with Omnitemp memory foam block that adapts to your body while improving your blood circulation. Super soft upper padding and 4 cm of Omnitemp memory foam.

name: Mattress Odín
title: A better rest every night
description: The 4 cm memory foam upper padding will make your mattress fit you. Ideal for reducing body pressure and improving blood circulation.

name: Split Upholstered Base
title: The most practical format
description: The split upholstered base is divided into two parts, allowing greater ease of transportation and access to the home. An economic and simple option that guarantees a good rest. Legs included.

name: Bed base Lama 120
title: Resistance and breathability for rest
description: The Lama 120 Beech Bed Base is made of 120mm wide slats. The wide sheet allows more support to the mattress, providing greater firmness at rest. Robust, resistant and maintains the perfect ventilation of the mattresses. Bed base height without legs 5cm.

name: Premium Frame Upholstered Base
title: Exclusivity at your fingertips!
description: Maxcolchon in its continuous development of new products and designs offers you the Premium Frame Upholstered Base. Its innovative design allows the combination of the exceptional Aqualine fabric with the central non-slip fabric that maintains greater breathability of the mattresses.

name: Upholstered Base
title: The perfection of the design adapted to rest
description: The Just Sleep Upholstered Base, a new concept of rest that provides a modern design in three different upholsteries: Anthracite, Steel or Black.

name: Articulated bed base
title: Elegance and design for your rest
description: The Just Sleep Articulated Bed Base with motor is an excellent option for rest. A novelty that you can acquire through Maxcolchon. Great elegance thanks to its careful aesthetics and avant-garde design, exterior upholstery with chenille to perfectly combine with any decoration, creating an excellent atmosphere in your bedroom.
